articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: BCCI President Roger Binny, Vice-President Rajeev Shukla To Travel To Pakistan On PCB's Invitation: .. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: BCCI president Roger Binny and vice-president Rajeev Shukla have reportedly accepted the invitation of the Pakistan Cricket Board and will be in Lahore from September 4-7 during which they will watch a couple of Asia Cup games.
